bill_title: to revise provisions relating to overtime compensation for certain air rescue firefighters.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise provisions relating to overtime compensation for certain air rescue firefighters. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 3-8 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For the purposes of determining overtime hours for air rescue firefighters as defined by § 3- 12-47, only the time in excess of the work period allowed under the provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act, 29 USC § 207(k) as of January 1, 1997, shall be considered for overtime compensation. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
